description: Try our easy to follow Trout Bagels With Grapefruit Butter Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Trout Bagels With Grapefruit Butter Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup freshly squeezed red flesh grapefruit juice
2 free range egg yolks (4 free range eggs)
300g hot smoked trout, flesh removed and flaked (skin and bones discarded)

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk egg yolks, grapefruit juice and sugar together in a large heatproof bowl. Place bowl over a saucepan of simmering water, ensuring base of bowl does not touch water. Add a cube of butter and whisk until butter melts and is well combined. Continue whisking and adding butter, one piece at a time, until a smooth, thickened sauce forms. Remove bowl from pan and set pan and water aside. Season sauce and stir through chives. Cover surface of sauce with plastic wrap and set aside until required.
Return same pan to medium heat and bring to a simmer. Break eggs into water and cook for 3-4 minutes or until cooked to your liking.
Place bagel bases onto serving plates. Top with rocket, trout and a poached egg. Spoon over sauce and serve with bagel top.
